channel.title: Property Observer on Coding life
channel.description: Recent content in Property Observer on Coding life

item.title: The beauty of Swift Language â€” Property Observer
item.description: Swift is one of my favourite computer languages. I would like to write a series of articles to demonstrate its beauty by comparing it with some other languages(C#, Kotlin) in areas like Property Observation , Property wrapper, Builders, Macros , Structured concurrency etc. This article , as the first of this series, will focus on the Property Observation.
